DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect single dose cranberry beverage healthy adult kinetic uptake polyphenol compound polyphenol metabolite , antioxidative anti-inflammatory activity .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Single Dose Cranberry Beverage Inflammation Oxidative Stress
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize base age , sex BMI , consume low-polyphenol diet 2 day prior intervention . On day study , baseline blood urine sample collect overnight fast . Participants consume assign beverage within 15 minute blood collect 2 , 4 , 8 , 24 h ( 10 mL/blood draw ; total blood volume per period = 50 mL ) . Urine collect polyphenol analysis follow period : 0-3 , 3-6 , 6-9 , 9-12 , 12-24 hour . After one-week washout period , participant receive second third beverage cross-over design ; blood urine sample repeat 3 intervention period .
DOC.criteria: Men & woman ; age 1835 year BMI : 1925 kg/m2 Any significant chronic disease , hypertension , ulcer , dyspepsia , lactose intolerance , allergy , psychotic illness Had major gastrointestinal surgery prescription surgical treatment Any condition may interfere digestion , absorption , metabolism excretion nutrient Regularly smoke previous 6 month On medication ingest prescribed drug time within 14 day precede study enrolment ( exclude hormonal contraceptive hormone replacement therapy ) overthecounter preparation within 7 day precede enrolment Risk factor AIDS know HIV positive status Pregnant lactate High intake chocolate similar high polyphenol food Regular intake vitamin polyphenol supplement Drug alcohol misuse Currently participate participate another clinical study previous 3 week Donated blood previous 3 week Exercise 3 times/week longer 45 min time
